FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, northerly or northeasterly 3 to 5, increasing 6 for a time in south but becoming variable 2 to 4 in north. In northwest, northerly 3 to 5 becoming variable 2 to 4, then becoming cyclonic 5 to 7 later in west.
Sea state
Very rough at first in far south, otherwise moderate or rough.
Weather
In southeast, showers, becoming fair later. In northwest, showers, then rain later.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally moderate. In northwest, good, becoming moderate or poor later in west.
